HomeSection.title: THE SITE DECIDES
HomeSection.question:
Do you want your business to 
 make money?

FeatureSection.title:
Why should you 
 Work with us?
FeatureSection.feature_1_name: You don't need a technical specification
FeatureSection.feature_2_name: You don't overpay for unnecessary managers
FeatureSection.feature_1_description: Your task is to tell us about your problem, and we will create a technical specification and find the best solutions to solve it.
FeatureSection.feature_2_description: We are a small team focused on results. You communicate directly with specialists without wasting time on a manager.
FeatureSection.feature_3_description: By following Elon Musk's principles, we were able to speed up our processes compared to other agencies. First, we create the most necessary website features.

site_1.name: Landing page
site_1.description: Car sales, franchise, course sales, road sign sales, accounting

site_2.name: Multipage site
site_2.description: Art materials, food delivery, dry ice sales, food sales, travel agency

SalePointSection.title:
Your site is not just 
 code, but a magnet for 
 customers and profits!
SalePointSection.message:
We will always be in touch with you and 
 help with any questions or problems!

TeamSection.title: Our team
TeamSection.description: We are a team of creative developers, designers, and marketers who have come together to create effective, stylish, and technologically advanced web solutions.

developer_1.name: Fedir Alpatov
developer_1.description: Creating a website for selling courses is a complex process that includes several key stages. Each of them is aimed at ensuring user convenience and effective sales.

developer_2.name: Diana Merkotun
developer_2.description: Creating a website for selling courses is a complex process that includes several key stages. Each of them is aimed at ensuring user convenience and effective sales.

ReviewsSection.title:
Відгуки - що про нас 
 говорять наші клієнти

card_1.name: Володимир
card_1.task: Розробіть ринок доставки їжі та цільову сторінку для франшизи
card_1.description: Професійна команда, яка дійсно знає своє ремесло! Ми замовили корпоративний сайт, і результат перевершив наші очікування. Дизайн стильний, все працює гладко, а головне - зручний для наших клієнтів.
